text: allah natiyiruntal avarkal anaivaraiyume (ore markkattaip pinparrum) ore camukattinarakki iruppan. (Eninum, avarkal anaivarutaiya natattaiyum orevitamaka irukkavillai.) Akave, tan virumpiyavarkalaiye tan arulil pukuttukiran. Aniyayakkarar(kalait tappana valiyil vittuvittan. Avar)kalai (annalil) patukappavarkalum illai; (avarkalukku) utavi ceypavarkalum illai
